page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: {Oughtibridge Junior and Infant School has approximately 300 pupils,children start in the term before their 5th. birthday and leave in the summer term of their 11th. year.Most children then go to the local Comprehensive school which is Bradfield Worrall school. Evening classes run by Sheffield Education are held in the school. The school was opened in 1974 {Wharncliffe Side School }has less than 100 junior and infant pupils,it does however have a 50 place nursery school which caters for children with special needs.The school has a nature trail and an environmental centre. Evening classes are held in the school.
